Read pileup, indexed by tabix

Source: R/pileup.R
read_pileup.Rd

Read pileup, indexed by tabix

Usage

read_pileup(tbx_fn, region = NULL)

Arguments

tbx_fn

filename

region

region to read from file, samtools style region specifiers are supported.

Examples

bamfn <- system.file("extdata", "SRR5564269_Aligned.sortedByCoord.out.md.bam", package = "raer")
fafn <- system.file("extdata", "human.fasta", package = "raer")

plp <- get_pileup(bamfn, fafn, return_data = FALSE)
read_pileup(plp)
